experience.title: Summer Internship
experience.description: I'mbesideyou Inc. is a Japanese AI-based SaaS company• Ideated a web app for entrepreneurs to create their video pitch for funding and designed the figma prototype• Introduced features like AI - based feedback report with actionable insights and record the video pitch in parts• Conceptualized the core parameters of the feedback report: Funding Indicator, Activity Score, Engagement Score• Collaborated with entrepreneurs and identified their pain points of making the startup’s video pitch for funding• Reached out to VC fund managers to understand on what parameters they evaluate the startup’s video pitches
experience.description_html: I'mbesideyou Inc. is a Japanese AI-based SaaS company• Ideated a web app for entrepreneurs to create their video pitch for funding and designed the figma prototype• Introduced features like AI - based feedback report with actionable insights and record the video pitch in parts• Conceptualized the core parameters of the feedback report: Funding Indicator, Activity Score, Engagement Score• Collaborated with entrepreneurs and identified their pain points of making the startup’s video pitch for funding• Reached out to VC fund managers to understand on what parameters they evaluate the startup’s video pitches

experience.title: Strategy and Operations
experience.description: Bitclass is the largest live learning platform which helps teachers to successfully setup and grow their online live teaching business.• Conducted market research survey to understand the learning behaviour of the target audience• Worked on course development strategies and reached out to 30+ subject matter experts for the same• Curated course outline for 11 courses from the insightful data received from the one-to-one talks with the experts

experience.title: Curriculum Developer
experience.description: LEAD School is a India's 1st school Ed-Tech unicorn.• Curated engaging learning activities for grades 1-10 to consolidate practical learning of the mathematical concept• Upgraded the existing homework content for 11 Mathematics chapters of CBSE and state boards• Created 6 revision worksheets and their solutions for grade 1 and 8 Mathematics chapters of CBSE board• Reviewed the 5 revision worksheets and their solutions for grades 6-9 and suggested important changes

positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
positions.description: Gopali Youth Welfare Society, one of India’s largest government registered student-run NGOs, run by a team of 100+ IIT Kharagpur students, spread across 11 states across the country in various colleges, reaching out to about 15,000+ beneficiaries nationwide.• Supervised the Panel Discussion event of YUVA (The first-ever social fest of GYWS) which attracted 100+ attendees• Successful in printing 3 articles in various media houses about the work done by GYWS in response to COVID-19• Fostering long term ties and building relations with local media houses to spread awareness about the work done• Handled the Instagram page of GYWS and devised online and offline national level publicity strategies for GYWS• Led a team of 16 freshmen, guided them in content writing for social media handles of GYWS
positions.title: Senior Executive Member
positions.description_html:
Gopali Youth Welfare Society, one of India’s largest government registered student-run NGOs, run by a team of 100+ IIT Kharagpur students, spread across 11 states across the country in various colleges, reaching out to about 15,000+ beneficiaries nationwide.

• Supervised the Panel Discussion event of YUVA (The first-ever social fest of GYWS) which attracted 100+ attendees
• Successful in printing 3 articles in various media houses about the work done by GYWS in response to COVID-19
• Fostering long term ties and building relations with local media houses to spread awareness about the work done
• Handled the Instagram page of GYWS and devised online and offline national level publicity strategies for GYWS
• Led a team of 16 freshmen, guided them in content writing for social media handles of GYWS

positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
positions.description: • Part of the 17-member fundraising team that accomplished the target of INR 4,00,000 for initiatives of GYWS• Actively participated in Yogdaan, an annual donation drive of GYWS raising INR 5,00,000 in 9 days• Prepared engaging content for the social media posts, bimonthly magazine of the organization• Co-ordinated with various national and local media houses for the press conference of the organization• Successfully printed an article in the "Indian Express" newspaper for the organization
positions.title: Junior Executive Member
positions.description_html:
• Part of the 17-member fundraising team that accomplished the target of INR 4,00,000 for initiatives of GYWS
• Actively participated in Yogdaan, an annual donation drive of GYWS raising INR 5,00,000 in 9 days
• Prepared engaging content for the social media posts, bimonthly magazine of the organization

• Successfully printed an article in the "Indian Express" newspaper for the organization
